OverallConfigValue
Field.Formula: =IF(["MBWA" Manage by Walking Around]=TRUE,IF([Put functions sheets together and hanging them up]=TRUE,IF([Price food for Events]=TRUE,IF([Go through Conference Center Kitchen making sure food is in date and stored properly]=TRUE,IF([Check Bistro to make sure there are no Maintains needs, if so do are request or call Zach]=TRUE,IF([Check temp logs making sure all logs are filled out correctly]=TRUE,IF([Make sure kitchen is getting cleaned properly daily]=TRUE,IF([Checks dates on all food in the Bistro making sure no food is out of date]=TRUE,IF([Watch to see how food is being prepared by servers]=TRUE,IF([Talk to Front Desk to see if there has been any feed back on the Bistro food (Good or Bad)]=TRUE,IF([Check to see if there are any new events in for the week]=TRUE,"YES","NO"),"NO"),"NO"),"NO"),"NO"),"NO"),"NO"),"NO"),"NO"),"NO"),"NO")

Field.Name: ChecklistStatus
Field.Formula: =IF(["MBWA" Manage by Walking Around]=TRUE,IF([Put functions sheets together and hanging them up]=TRUE,IF([Price food for Events]=TRUE,IF([Go through Conference Center Kitchen making sure food is in date and stored properly]=TRUE,IF([Check Bistro to make sure there are no Maintains needs, if so do are request or call Zach]=TRUE,IF([Check temp logs making sure all logs are filled out correctly]=TRUE,IF([Make sure kitchen is getting cleaned properly daily]=TRUE,IF([Checks dates on all food in the Bistro making sure no food is out of date]=TRUE,IF([Watch to see how food is being prepared by servers]=TRUE,IF([Talk to Front Desk to see if there has been any feed back on the Bistro food (Good or Bad)]=TRUE,IF([Check to see if there are any new events in for the week]=TRUE,"Completed","In Progress"),"In Progress"),"In Progress"),"In Progress"),"In Progress"),"In Progress"),"In Progress"),"In Progress"),"In Progress"),"In Progress"),"In Progress")
